description:
Logiticks provides effective and reliable information technology solutions and services for SMEs & Blue Chips. Our expertise in technology is coupled with a deep understanding of business needs. This allows us to offer solutions that result in productivity gains, operational efficiency and cost savings.
At Logiticks, we are focused on Predictability, Quality and Understanding the customer perspective. We recognize that our long-term success is directly aligned with success of our customers. We are 100% committed to making this happen.
Our focus areas include IoT, Blockchain, cloud-based web applications and Xamarin-based cross-platform mobile applications.
